mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coin_user (user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_phone, user_address, user_gender, user_email) VALUE (#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_phone}, #{user_address}, #{user_gender}, #{user_email})
mapper.select: select user_id from mybtc.coin_user where user_id=#{value}
select * from mybtc.coin_user where user_id=#{login_id} and user_pw=#{login_pw}
mapper.delete: delete from coin_user where user_id=#{login_id} and user_pw=#{login_pw}
mapper.update: update coin_user set user_pw=#{user_pw}, user_phone=#{user_phone}, user_address=#{user_address} where user_id=#{user_id}
